data.name: EMAIL_ALREADY_REGISTERED
data.value: The e-mail already registered.

data.name: EMAIL_EMPTY
data.value: The e-mail must not be empty.

data.name: EMAIL_INVALID
data.value: The e-mail address is invalid.

data.name: NAME_EMPTY
data.value: The name cannot be empty.

data.name: PASSWORD_EMPTY
data.value: The password must be longer than 6 characters.

data.name: UNKNOW_ERROR
data.value: Erro desconhecido.

data.name: EMAIL_OR_PASSWORD_INVALID
data.value: The e-mail or password is invalid

data.name: NO_TOKEN
data.value: The authentication token not exists.

data.name: USER_WITHOU_PERMISSION_ACCESS_RESOURCE
data.value: User does not have permission to access the requested resource.

data.name: INVALID_PASSWORD
data.value: Invalid password.

data.name: PASSWORD_DIFFERENT_CURRENT_PASSWORD
data.value: The new password must be different from the current password.

data.name: RECIPE_TITLE_EMPTY
data.value: The recipe title cannot be empty.

data.name: COOKING_TIME_NOT_SUPPORTED
data.value: Cooking time not supported.

data.name: DIFFICULTY_LEVEL_NOT_SUPPORTED
data.value: Difficulty level not supported.

data.name: AT_LEAST_ONE_INGREDIENT
data.value: The recipe must contain at least one ingredient.

data.name: AT_LEAST_ONE_INSTRUCTION
data.value: The recipe must contain at least one instruction.

data.name: DISH_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED
data.value: Dish type not supported.

data.name: INGREDIENT_EMPTY
data.value: The ingredient name cannot be empty.

data.name: NON_NEGATIVE_OR_ZERO_INSTRUCTION_STEP
data.value: The instruction step number must be greater than zero.

data.name: INSTRUCTION_EXCEEDS_LIMIT_CHARACTERS
data.value: The instruction exceeds the maximum character limit.

data.name: TWO_OR_MORE_INSTRUCTIONS_SAME_ORDER
data.value: Two or more instructions cannot have the same order.

data.name: INSTRUCTION_EMPTY
data.value: The instruction cannot be empty.

data.name: RECIPE_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Recipe not found.

data.name: INVALID_NUMBER_INGREDIENTS
data.value: Invalid number of ingredients. The recipe must contain between 1 and 5 ingredients.

data.name: DUPLICATED_INGREDIENTS_IN_LIST
data.value: Duplicated ingredients. The recipe cannot contain repeated ingredients.

data.name: INGREDIENT_NOT_FOLLOWING_PATTERN
data.value: Ingredient not following the pattern. Each ingredient must contain between 3 and 100 characters and must not include invalid symbols.

data.name: ONLY_IMAGES_ACCEPTED
data.value: Invalid file type. Only JPG and PNG image formats are accepted.

data.name: CODE_INVALID
data.value: A valid code is required to reset your password.

data.name: USER_NOT_FOUND
data.value: User not found with this email.

data.name: CODE_REQUIRED
data.value: The code is required.

data.name: EMAIL_REQUIRED
data.value: Email is required.

data.name: PASSWORDS_DO_NOT_MATCH
data.value: The passwords do not match.

data.name: PASSWORD_MAX_LENGTH
data.value: The password must be at most 100 characters long.

data.name: PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH
data.value: The password must be at least 8 characters long.

data.name: PASSWORD_REQUIRED
data.value: Password is required.

data.name: EXPIRED_SESSION
data.value: your session is expired.

data.name: INVALID_SESSION
data.value: Invalid or expired session. Please log in again.
